name: Le Prarion, Chamonix, France
description:
LUSHFOIL PHOTOGRAPHY SIM - OPEN BETA 3
Available for two weeks only, from 8th to 22nd Feb

PLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING BEFORE DOWNLOADING-

-This environment is fairly late game and the player is expected to have a base understanding of how objectives/progression works. if you're having trouble figuring things out feel free to post a question on discord and someone will be able to help you!

- SPOILERS; if you're intending on experiencing the game in it's complete form for the first time, I reccomend waiting for the final release. i'll be spoiling a lot of endgame features from this beta onwards

- STREAMERS/YOUTUBERS If you are uploading footage, please include "Lushfoil Photography Sim" in the title, also consider using the 'copyright free' setting or disabling music altogether in order to not get a copyright strike

- for all BUGS/PROBLEMS Please join the Discord and post in the appropriate channel, try to be as specific as possible and give info on your specs if they're relevant to your problem

- If you're posting any screenshots on social media i'd love to see them, please consider tagging me (@cavesrd) 

- ALSO be sure to wishlist on steam! this will have a very direct influence on how well the game will perform at launch 😊

---
